marketplaces.name: photo-mcp-marketplace
marketplaces.description: Unsplash photo search tools for Claude Code

files.README.md:
# photo-mcp

A Claude Code plugin that provides Unsplash photo search tools via MCP.

> **Note**: This uses Unsplash's internal API. No API key required, but endpoints may change without notice.

## Tools

| Tool | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `search_photos` | Search Unsplash by query |
| `get_photo` | Get full details for a photo ID |
| `get_related_photos` | Find visually similar photos |
| `get_photo_series` | Get photos from the same series as a given photo |
| `get_collection_photos` | Get all photos from a collection by ID |

## Installation

### Claude Code Plugin (recommended)

```bash
/plugin marketplace add jsemldonado/photo-mcp
/plugin install photo-mcp@photo-mcp-marketplace
```

Then restart Claude Code.

### As MCP Server

Add to your `.mcp.json` or MCP client config:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "photo-mcp": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["photo-mcp"]
    }
  }
}
```

### Local development

```bash
claude --plugin-dir /path/to/photo-mcp
```

## Project Structure

```
photo-mcp/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json       # Claude Code plugin manifest
├── .mcp.json             # MCP server configuration
└── mcp/
    ├── src/
    │   ├── lib/
    │   │   └── unsplash.ts
    │   └── tools/
    │       ├── search-photos.ts
    │       ├── get-photo.ts
    │       ├── get-related-photos.ts
    │       └── get-photo-series.ts
    ├── dist/             # Built output
    ├── xmcp.config.ts
    └── package.json
```

## Development

```bash
cd mcp
bun install
bun run dev
```

## Build

```bash
cd mcp
bun run build
```

## License

MIT
